Vpalmr 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Main functions

Higher level, more user-friendly functions that call the other using few parameters

compute_archi()

Compute Architectural parameters

make_scene()

Make a full 3D scene

Model fitting functions (nls, lme, nlme)

Functions that fits particular models to the input data

mod_all()

Fit all models

mod_stem_diameter() mod_stem_height() mod_rachis_length() mod_petiole_ratio() mod_B_position() mod_nb_leaflet() mod_C_declination() mod_leaf_curvature() mod_A_declination() mod_A_deviation() mod_leaflet_position() mod_leaflet_length_B() mod_leaflet_width_B() mod_leaflet_length() mod_leaflet_width() mod_leaflet_axial_angle() mod_leaflet_radial_angle() mod_leaflet_type_freq() mod_leaflet_shape() mod_petiole_width_C() mod_petiole_height()

Fit the models

Import / Initialization

Functions for initializing, reading or writing data.

import_data()

Import all data

init_list()

Parameter initialization

Plots

Automatic plot generation

plot_all()

Plot all model outputs

plot_stem_diameter() plot_stem_height() plot_rachis_length() plot_petiole_ratio() plot_B_position() plot_nb_leaflet() plot_C_declination() plot_leaf_curvature() plot_A_declination() plot_A_deviation() plot_leaflet_position() plot_leaflet_length_B() plot_leaflet_width_B() plot_leaflet_length() plot_leaflet_width() plot_leaflet_axial_angle() plot_leaflet_radial_angle() plot_leaflet_type_freq() plot_leaflet_shape() plot_petiole_width_C() plot_petiole_height()

Plot the architectural parameters estimations

Leaflet scale functions

VPalm functions at leaflet scale, used to find the parameters

leaflet_length() leaflet_max_width()

Leaflet dimensions

find_angle()

Compute the leaflet angles

leaflet_axial_angle()

Axial insertion angle

leaflet_radial_angle()

Radial insertion angle

leaflet_shape_nls()

Fit nls on leaflet shape

shape_beta()

Beta function for leaflet shape

leaflet_position()

Leaflet position

Leaf scale functions

VPalm functions at leaf scale, used to find the parameters

curvature()

Curvature

leaf_curvature()

Leaf curvature

curvature_error()

Leaf curvature error

optim_Leaf_Curv_Infl()

Optimize leaf curvature parameters

deviation_A()

Leaf deviation

section_height()

Rachis section height

Stem functions

VPalm functions for the stem, used to find the parameters

stem_height()

Stem height

Extract

Extract the VPalm parameters from the models outputs

extract_params()

Extract VPalm parameters

extract_progeny()

VPalm parameter list for all progenies

extract_trees()

Extract several VPalm parameters

Format

Format the parameters lists as a VPalm input

format_ops()

Format ops information

format_progeny()

Format all parameters lists

format_tree()

Format a VPalm input list

Write

Writting the pre-formatted parameter lists in a VPalm input file

write_models()

Write model

write_ops()

Write OPS

write_progeny()

Writes all progenies VPalm inputs

write_tree()

Write VPalm tree parameter file

Design of experiment

Computes a planting pattern for the OPS file

design_plot()

Design the plot

Make

Make VPalm input files

make_opf()

Make OPF

make_opf_all()

Make a set of opf file

make_ops_all()

Format and write all OPS

make_scene()

Make a full 3D scene

Helpers

Different helpers (Al-Kashi, curvature, distances…)

AlKashi()

AlKashi

distance_2D()

Distance bewteen 2D points

object_lenght()

Lenght of non-linear objects

object_tans()

Compute the tangants along non-linear objects

sigmoid()

Sigmoidal function

pmean()

Parallel mean

coef_sample()

Simulation coefficient

pull_lme() pull_nlme() pull_others()

Pull (n)lme output

Tests

Helper functions for testing the input data format or missing values

test_Area() test_development()

Test the input data
